content: work when not in use instead carry it up along the side of work row 28-29 with color a ch1 turn scin each st 35 single_crochet row 30-31 with color b ch1 turn scin each st 35 single_crochet row 32-39 repeat row 28-31 twice fasten off color b ©2014 critical stitch dalek towel crochet pattern row 40 with color a ch1 turn scin each st magic_ring 35 sts wrap the yarn around your index row 41 chain 1 turn scin next st decrease twice and middle fingers and bring up scin next 23 sts decrease scin next st twice a loop inside the yarn circling 31 sts your fingers this is similar to row 42 chain 1 turn scin next st decrease twice creating a slip knot for a scin next 19 sts decrease scin next st twice beginning chain except you 27 sts don t pull the knot tight insert your hook into the loop and ch1 row 43 chain 1 turn scin next st decrease twice this secures your ring single_crochet around scin next 15 sts decrease scin next st 23 sts the ring then pull on the end to row 44 chain 1 turn scin next st decrease twice tighten scin next 11 sts decrease scin next st 19 sts row 45 chain 1 turn scin next st decrease twice button scin next 7 sts decrease scin next st 15 sts with color b make an row 46 chain 1 turn scin next st decrease twice magic_ring scin next 3 sts decrease scin next st 11 sts round 1 single_crochet 5 times in adjustable row 47 chain 1 turn decrease scin next st three ring slstto first scin ring 5 single_crochet times decrease 7 sts round 2 chain 1 2 scin same single_crochet row 48 chain 1 turn scin each st 7 single_crochet and each scaround sl st to first scin round 10 single_crochet row 49-62 repeat row 48 fasten_off leaving a tail and row 63 chain 1 turn scin next two sts ch3 skip attach to center of row 43-45 next three sts scin last two sts this row forms buttonhole 4 single_crochet chain-3 space row 64 chain 1 turn scin next two scs 3 scin chain-3 space scin last two sts 7 single_crochet row 65-66 chain 1 turn scin each st 7 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends ©2014 critical stitch
